CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Incoming SMS sound
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Play a sound when a new SMS arrives
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Don't play a sound when a new SMS arrives

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Outgoing SMS sound
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Play a sound when you send a SMS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Don't play a sound when you send a SMS

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show notification for new SMS
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Show a notification when a new SMS arrives
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Don't show a notification when a new SMS arrives

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatically dismiss built-in notifications
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Hide the system SMS notification when a new SMS arrives
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Leave the system SMS notification when a new SMS arrives
